projects.title: Unanswered Questions
projects.description:
A concept piece based around historical philosphers. Built using html, css, js, jquery, tailwindcss, owl carousel, wikimedia's api, google's api, and an open philosophical quote api. Built in collaboration with a small group. 
 Updated may 2020 to be web hostable using node, express, sequelize, mysql, dotenv, bcrypt, handlebars, and many more nodejs packages.

projects.title: Project Manager
projects.description: A quickly made project manager made during the UW's coding bootcamp. Built on HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, Bootstrap4, and Moment.js

projects.title: Work Day Scheduler
projects.description: A work day planner built using HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap4, and Moment.js

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: A random string generator with options for special characters, numbers, etc. Built on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: Egg Weather
projects.description: A weather dashboard with server API calls, built on HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, and MomentJS.
